GetClassType.name: GetClassType
GetClassType.description: Get the type of this class.

GetElementsCount.name: GetElementsCount
GetElementsCount.description: Get the number of elements in the current document.

GetElement.name: GetElement
GetElement.description: Get the element by its position in the document.

AddElement.name: AddElement
AddElement.description: Add paragraph or table using its position in the document.

params.name: nPos
params.description: The position where the current element will be added.

params.name: oElement
params.description: The document element which will be added at the current position.

Push.name: Push
Push.description: Push a paragraph or a table to actually add it to the document.

params.name: oElement
params.description: The type of the element which will be pushed to the document.

RemoveAllElements.name: RemoveAllElements
RemoveAllElements.description: Remove all elements from the current document or from the current document element.<note>When all elements are removed, a new empty paragraph is automatically created. If you want to addcontent to this paragraph, use the ApiDocumentContent.GetElement method.</note>

RemoveElement.name: RemoveElement
RemoveElement.description: Remove element using the position specified.

params.name: nPos
params.description: The element number (position) in the document or inside other element.

comment:
/**
	 * Class representing a container for paragraphs and tables.
	 * @param Document
	 * @constructor
	 */
description: Class representing a container for paragraphs and tables.
